name: Stealth game (chakki2209)
description: This stealth game project was an opportunity for me to sharpen my programming skills and showcase my expertise in game development. I designed and implemented advanced AI path-following algorithms, which included basic save and load functionality, seamless animation transitions, and smooth third-person camera movements. One of the unique features of the game is the "danger zone" mechanic, which I coded entirely in shader language for improved performance and graphical fidelity. By utilizing my proficiency in both C# and shader programming, I was able to create a proof-of-concept that highlights my technical abilities and attention to detail.
